title: go1.7beta1: godoc is a Go tour on Darwin
body:
```
go version
go version go1.7beta1 darwin/amd64

which godoc
/usr/local/go/bin/godoc

godoc -h
Usage of godoc:
  -http string
    	host:port to listen on (default "127.0.0.1:3999")
  -openbrowser
    	open browser automatically (default true)
```
